traps.name: Pressure Plate Spike Trap
traps.description: A hidden pressure plate triggers spikes to shoot from the floor, walls, or ceiling.
traps.disarmMethod: Thieves' Tools

traps.name: Poison Dart Trap
traps.description: Tiny holes in the walls shoot poisoned darts when triggered.
traps.disarmMethod: Thieves' Tools or block the holes

traps.name: Pit Trap
traps.description: A false floor gives way to a deep pit, often with spikes at the bottom.
traps.disarmMethod: Spike the hinges or bridge the gap

traps.name: Swinging Blade Trap
traps.description: A massive blade or axe swings across the corridor when triggered.
traps.disarmMethod: Thieves' Tools or jam the mechanism

traps.name: Collapsing Ceiling
traps.description: The ceiling begins to collapse when a trigger is activated.
traps.disarmMethod: Support beams or disable trigger

traps.name: Arcane Glyph
traps.description: A magical rune that explodes with elemental energy when disturbed.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or careful disarming

traps.name: Sleep Gas Trap
traps.description: Invisible gas fills the area, causing drowsiness and unconsciousness.
traps.disarmMethod: Block vents or disable mechanism

traps.name: Net Trap
traps.description: A weighted net drops from above or springs from below, restraining victims.
traps.disarmMethod: Cut the net or disable trigger

traps.name: Lightning Discharge Trap
traps.description: Metal surfaces or rods discharge powerful electrical energy.
traps.disarmMethod: Ground the current or disable power source

traps.name: Alarm Trap
traps.description: A magical or mechanical alarm alerts guards or creatures to intruders.
traps.disarmMethod: Thieves' Tools or Dispel Magic

traps.name: Flame Jet Trap
traps.description: Gouts of flame shoot from holes in the floor or walls.
traps.disarmMethod: Block the jets or disable fuel source

traps.name: Freezing Mist Trap
traps.description: Supernatural cold mist erupts, freezing everything in its path.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or disable source

traps.name: Crushing Wall Trap
traps.description: Walls close in from either side, crushing anything between them.
traps.disarmMethod: Jam the mechanism or destroy control

traps.name: Acid Spray Trap
traps.description: Pressurized acid sprays from hidden nozzles.
traps.disarmMethod: Neutralize acid or disable mechanism

traps.name: Teleportation Circle Trap
traps.description: Stepping on the circle teleports victims to a dangerous location.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or redirect destination

traps.name: Rolling Boulder Trap
traps.description: A massive stone boulder rolls down a sloped corridor.
traps.disarmMethod: Avoid, redirect, or destroy the boulder

traps.name: Scything Blade Hallway
traps.description: Multiple blades swing in sequence across a long corridor.
traps.disarmMethod: Timing and agility, or disable all mechanisms

traps.name: Quicksand Pit
traps.description: What appears to be solid ground is actually quicksand that traps victims.
traps.disarmMethod: Avoid or create a solid path

traps.name: Illusory Floor
traps.description: An illusion makes a pit appear as solid ground, or vice versa.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or careful navigation

traps.name: Summoning Circle Trap
traps.description: A magical circle summons hostile creatures when activated.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or deface the circle

traps.name: Tripwire Alarm Bell
traps.description: Nearly invisible wire triggers a loud bell or gong when disturbed.
traps.disarmMethod: Cut wire or muffle the bell

traps.name: Poison Gas Vent
traps.description: Vents release clouds of toxic gas that linger in the area.
traps.disarmMethod: Seal vents or disable pump

traps.name: Cage Drop Trap
traps.description: A metal cage drops from above, trapping victims inside.
traps.disarmMethod: Jam mechanism or disable trigger

traps.name: Electrified Water
traps.description: Standing water is charged with electricity, shocking anyone who steps in.
traps.disarmMethod: Disconnect power source or drain water

traps.name: Curse Trigger
traps.description: Touching or disturbing an object inflicts a magical curse.
traps.disarmMethod: Dispel Magic or Remove Curse

traps.name: Portcullis Drop
traps.description: Heavy iron gate slams down, blocking passage and potentially crushing victims.
traps.disarmMethod: Spike the mechanism or lift with Strength

traps.name: Mirror Maze Trap
traps.description: Illusory and real mirrors create a confusing maze; some mirrors are razor-sharp.
traps.disarmMethod: Shatter mirrors or navigate carefully

traps.name: Petrification Ray
traps.description: Hidden crystalline eyes shoot rays that slowly turn victims to stone.
traps.disarmMethod: Cover the eyes or Dispel Magic

traps.name: Rope Bridge Sabotage
traps.description: Bridge ropes are deliberately weakened to snap under weight.
traps.disarmMethod: Repair ropes or find alternate path

traps.name: Statue Construct Attack
traps.description: Stone statues animate and attack when intruders are detected.
traps.disarmMethod: Destroy or deactivate control mechanism

hazards.name: Unstable Floor
hazards.description: The floor is weak and may collapse under weight.

hazards.name: Toxic Fumes
hazards.description: Poisonous gases seep from cracks or are present in the air.

hazards.name: Extreme Heat
hazards.description: The area is dangerously hot, causing exhaustion and damage.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Freezing temperatures threaten hypothermia and frostbite.

hazards.name: Thin Ice
hazards.description: Ice covering water is dangerously thin and may break.

hazards.name: Slippery Surfaces
hazards.description: Moss, ice, or slime makes surfaces treacherous.

hazards.name: Falling Rocks
hazards.description: Loose stones frequently fall from above.

hazards.name: High Winds
hazards.description: Powerful winds threaten to knock people over or off ledges.

hazards.name: Dense Fog
hazards.description: Thick fog heavily obscures vision and disorients travelers.

hazards.name: Radiation Zone
hazards.description: Harmful radiation permeates the area, causing sickness.

hazards.name: Antigravity Field
hazards.description: Gravity is reduced or eliminated, making movement difficult.

hazards.name: Darkness
hazards.description: Magical or absolute darkness that normal light cannot penetrate.

hazards.name: Wild Magic Zone
hazards.description: Magic behaves unpredictably, with random effects.

hazards.name: Dead Magic Zone
hazards.description: All magic is suppressed in this area.

hazards.name: Corrosive Environment
hazards.description: Acid or corrosive substances damage equipment and flesh.

hazards.name: Earthquake Tremors
hazards.description: The ground shakes violently and unpredictably.

hazards.name: Flooding Waters
hazards.description: Water rapidly fills the area from an unknown source.

hazards.name: Tidal Surge
hazards.description: Ocean tides surge in, threatening to wash victims away.

hazards.name: Lava Flows
hazards.description: Rivers or pools of molten rock pose extreme danger.

hazards.name: Thin Air
hazards.description: High altitude causes oxygen deprivation.

hazards.name: Sandstorm
hazards.description: A violent storm of sand reduces visibility and causes damage.

hazards.name: Lightning Storm
hazards.description: Frequent lightning strikes pose a constant threat.

hazards.name: Avalanche Risk
hazards.description: Loud noises or vibrations may trigger a deadly avalanche.

hazards.name: Haunted Atmosphere
hazards.description: Supernatural presence causes fear and unease.

hazards.name: Bioluminescent Spores
hazards.description: Glowing spores cause hallucinations if inhaled.

hazards.name: Sinking Mud
hazards.description: Deep, thick mud threatens to trap and suffocate victims.

hazards.name: Razor Coral Reef
hazards.description: Sharp coral cuts deeply and infections spread quickly in seawater.

hazards.name: Rogue Automaton Patrol
hazards.description: Malfunctioning mechanical guardians attack anything that moves.

hazards.name: Necrotic Aura
hazards.description: Death energy permeates the area, draining life force.

hazards.name: Memory Fog
hazards.description: Strange mist causes short-term memory loss and disorientation.

hazards.name: Vertigo Heights
hazards.description: Extreme height and exposure cause dizziness and fear.

hazards.name: Carnivorous Plants
hazards.description: Aggressive plant life attempts to grab and digest intruders.

hazards.name: Choking Dust Cloud
hazards.description: Ancient dust fills the air, making breathing difficult.

hazards.name: Unstable Reality
hazards.description: The fabric of reality shifts unpredictably; objects phase in and out.

hazards.name: Flesh-Eating Beetles
hazards.description: Swarms of tiny beetles devour organic matter.

environmentalEffects.name: Howling Wind
environmentalEffects.description: Strong winds create noise and make hearing difficult.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Disadvantage on Perception (hearing)

environmentalEffects.name: Heavy Rain
environmentalEffects.description: Rainfall creates noise, reduces visibility, and makes surfaces slick.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Disadvantage on Perception; difficult terrain

environmentalEffects.name: Falling Snow
environmentalEffects.description: Snowfall obscures vision and leaves tracks.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Lightly obscured; tracks are visible

environmentalEffects.name: Bioluminescence
environmentalEffects.description: Plants or creatures emit soft, eerie light.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Dim light throughout area

environmentalEffects.name: Echoing Chambers
environmentalEffects.description: Sound bounces and amplifies strangely in this space.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Stealth is difficult; sound travels far

environmentalEffects.name: Oppressive Heat
environmentalEffects.description: Uncomfortable warmth that causes fatigue over time.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Exhaustion on failed saves after extended exposure

environmentalEffects.name: Biting Cold
environmentalEffects.description: Chilling temperatures that sap energy.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Exhaustion on failed saves after extended exposure

environmentalEffects.name: Magnetic Anomaly
environmentalEffects.description: Strong magnetic fields disrupt compasses and metal objects.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Compasses don't work; metal weapons feel strange

environmentalEffects.name: Temporal Distortion
environmentalEffects.description: Time flows strangely, faster or slower than normal.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Time passage differs from outside

environmentalEffects.name: Arcane Saturation
environmentalEffects.description: The air crackles with excess magical energy.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Spells may have enhanced or unpredictable effects

environmentalEffects.name: Cursed Ground
environmentalEffects.description: The area is tainted by dark magic or evil deeds.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Healing is less effective; undead are stronger

environmentalEffects.name: Consecrated Ground
environmentalEffects.description: Holy or divine energy permeates the area.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Undead and fiends are weakened; holy magic strengthened

environmentalEffects.name: Verdant Growth
environmentalEffects.description: Plants grow with supernatural speed and density.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Difficult terrain; natural cover everywhere

environmentalEffects.name: Crystalline Resonance
environmentalEffects.description: Crystals throughout the area hum and vibrate.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Sound-based effects are amplified

environmentalEffects.name: Planar Bleed
environmentalEffects.description: Another plane of existence bleeds through into this area.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Strange creatures may appear; physics may differ

environmentalEffects.name: Primal Energy
environmentalEffects.description: Raw, untamed elemental energy flows through the area.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Elemental creatures are empowered

environmentalEffects.name: Absolute Silence
environmentalEffects.description: All sound is magically or naturally suppressed.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: No sound can be made; verbal spells fail

environmentalEffects.name: Mist of Memory
environmentalEffects.description: Mist causes those within to see visions of the past.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Concentration difficult; may learn history

environmentalEffects.name: Floating Debris
environmentalEffects.description: Objects and debris float weightlessly in the air.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Ranged attacks difficult; movement is strange

environmentalEffects.name: Perpetual Twilight
environmentalEffects.description: The area is locked in eternal dusk, neither day nor night.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Dim light always; time is ambiguous

environmentalEffects.name: Whispering Shadows
environmentalEffects.description: Shadows move on their own and seem to whisper secrets.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Unnerving; may provide cryptic information

environmentalEffects.name: Regenerating Flora
environmentalEffects.description: Plants heal and regrow almost instantly when damaged.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Clearing paths is temporary

environmentalEffects.name: Meteor Showers
environmentalEffects.description: Small meteorites occasionally fall from the sky.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Random fire damage potential

environmentalEffects.name: Fungal Network
environmentalEffects.description: Interconnected fungi allow psychic communication.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Telepathy possible; fungi may react to thoughts

environmentalEffects.name: Spectral Echoes
environmentalEffects.description: Ghostly images of past events replay periodically.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: May provide clues; can be distracting

environmentalEffects.name: Acidic Rain
environmentalEffects.description: Rainfall is mildly corrosive, damaging equipment over time.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Equipment degrades; minor damage to exposed skin

environmentalEffects.name: Illusory Terrain
environmentalEffects.description: The landscape appears different than it truly is.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Navigation difficult; may walk into hazards

environmentalEffects.name: Blood-Soaked Ground
environmentalEffects.description: The earth is stained with the blood of ancient battles.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Healing magic weakened; violence is empowered

environmentalEffects.name: Living Shadows
environmentalEffects.description: Shadows move independently and seem almost alive.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Darkvision doesn't work normally; shadows may attack

environmentalEffects.name: Chrono-Flux
environmentalEffects.description: Time speeds up or slows down randomly in different areas.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Initiative and movement speeds vary unpredictably

environmentalEffects.name: Weightlessness Pockets
environmentalEffects.description: Gravity randomly fails in certain spots.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Movement becomes flight; items float away

environmentalEffects.name: Psychic Screams
environmentalEffects.description: Mental anguish from past victims echoes psychically.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Concentration checks harder; may cause fear

environmentalEffects.name: Miasma of Decay
environmentalEffects.description: The smell and presence of rot fills the air.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Constitution saves to avoid sickness; smell alerts enemies

environmentalEffects.name: Aurora Interference
environmentalEffects.description: Magical auroras interfere with spellcasting.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Spell attack rolls at disadvantage

environmentalEffects.name: Siren Song
environmentalEffects.description: Haunting music draws listeners toward danger.
environmentalEffects.mechanicalEffect: Wisdom saves to avoid being charmed/lured

dangers.name: Collapsing Stone Ceiling
dangers.description: Ancient support beams groan under the weight of cracked stone ceiling tiles. Pressure plates hidden beneath rubble on the floor trigger the collapse when stepped on, sending tons of stone crashing down.
dangers.detectMethod: Perception check to notice weakened supports and suspicious floor tiles, Investigation to identify pressure plate mechanisms
dangers.disarmMethod: Thieves' Tools to disable pressure plates, or brace weakened supports with wooden beams and stone wedges
